LanguageData.PlantFlax.label: Flax plant
LanguageData.PlantFlax.description: Yields Flax, a basic plant fiber used to make cloth.
LanguageData.PlantHemp.label: Hemp plant
LanguageData.PlantHemp.description: Yields Hemp, a fine plant fiber used to make cloth.
LanguageData.PlantChinese_Mulberry_Tree.label: Chinese Mulberry tree
LanguageData.PlantChinese_Mulberry_Tree.description: Chinese Mulberry Tree produce mulberry which is feed of silkworm. You can gain silk by giving it to silkworm. Of course, You should make silkworm farm.
